def.threejs.three

Class Points

  • java.lang.Object
    • def.js.Object
      • def.threejs.three.EventDispatcher
        • def.threejs.three.Object3D
          • def.threejs.three.Points
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParticleSystem, PointCloud

    public class Points
extends Object3D
    A class for displaying particles in the form of variable size points. For example, if using the WebGLRenderer, the particles are displayed using GL_POINTS.
    See Also:
    src/objects/ParticleSystem.js

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class def.threejs.three.Object3D

      An instance of Geometry or BufferGeometry, where each vertex designates the position of a particle in the system.

    • Field Detail

      • geometry

        public jsweet.util.union.Union<Geometry,BufferGeometry> geometry
        An instance of Geometry or BufferGeometry, where each vertex designates the position of a particle in the system.

      • material

        public Material material
        An instance of Material, defining the object's appearance. Default is a PointsMaterial with randomised colour.
